Text: The work you do is greatly appreciated by me.  Thanks a lot!
You're most welcome, Itto1972. Thanks for the kind words.

I would like to request restored versions of all the underground and alternative horror comics such as Taboo (TPB anthology series),
Fly in my Eye (TPB anthology series), etc.
Also, I would love to see Hypnotic Tales (TPB) by Richard Sala and any other work by him and Charles Burns which hasn't been previously uploaded.  Thank you in advance.
jessfranc, I'm working on most of the stuff you're requested. Can't say exactly when any of it will be uploaded, but you'll see some (or all) of it eventually.
